Sql.query: SELECT * FROM CAM_ITCDF121DET WHERE ITCDF121CODI=:ITCDF121CODI AND IND_DEL= :IND_DEL ORDER BY ITCDF121DETCODI DESC

INSERT INTO CAM_ITCDF121DET ( ITCDF121DETCODI, ITCDF121CODI, ANIO, VALOR, USU_CREACION, FEC_CREACION, IND_DEL ) VALUES ( :ITCDF121DETCODI, :ITCDF121CODI, :ANIO, :VALOR, :USU_CREACION, :FEC_CREACION, :IND_DEL )

UPDATE CAM_ITCDF121DET SET ITCDF121CODI = :ITCDF121CODI, ANIO = :ANIO, VALOR = :VALOR, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION WHERE ITCDF121DETCODI = :ITCDF121DETCODI
SELECT * FROM CAM_ITCDF121DET ORDER BY ITCDF121DETCODI DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

UPDATE CAM_ITCDF121DET SET IND_DEL = :IND_DEL, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION WHERE ITCDF121CODI IN (SELECT ITCDF121CODI FROM CAM_ITCDF121 WHERE PROYCODI = :PROYCODI AND IND_DEL=0 )
SELECT * FROM CAM_ITCDF121DET WHERE ITCDF121DETCODI = :ID AND IND_DEL = :IND_DEL ORDER BY ITCDF121DETCODI ASC
